memories

About our company

The work of our photographers can be described as a combination of artistic photography and photojournalism. The goal is to create beautifully designed images while maintaining the authenticity of the moments. With over 10 years of professional experience, we provide a wide range of photography services such as wedding photojournalism, wedding or engagement preparation, honeymoon and travel photography.

The work of our photographers can be described as a combination of artistic photography and photojournalism. The goal is to create beautifully designed images while maintaining the authenticity of the moments. With over 10 years of professional experience, we provide a wide range of photography services such as wedding photojournalism, wedding or engagement preparation, honeymoon and travel photography.

We are photographers and believe that love is life's greatest adventure

Florida and california wedding photography

We are a team of wedding photographers based in Los Angeles. We can get a glimpse into the lives of lovers at the beginning of their greatest adventure. Together with our couples, we can create something beautiful, powerful, honest and authentic

Let's start planning your best day with our team

A well thought out timeline is key for getting the best photos possible. A few months prior to your wedding we’ll be in touch over email with both you and your planner to collaborate on your wedding schedule to create the perfect custom timeline for your day. The venue and lighting are all taken into consideration to craft the ideal timeline for your day.

What we do

memories

It's an incredible privilege to be invited to tell the inspiring stories of couples who've found home in each other. We get to peek inside the lives of lovers at the beginning of their greatest adventure, and together, we get to create something beautiful, powerful, honest and authentic. We're less about frills and perfection, or how two people in love should look or act... we're all about how your love actually feels. The real stuff, the in-betweens. Whatever it is that makes you two, you. It's an incredible privilege to be invited to tell the inspiring stories of couples who've found home in each other. We get to peek inside the lives of lovers at the beginning of their greatest adventure, and together, we get to create something beautiful, powerful, honest and authentic. We're less about frills and perfection, or how two people in love should look or act... we're all about how your love actually feels.

We are happy to be a part of your day

memorable

Each wedding is unique, exciting and full of emotions, and we focus on the emotions. Our shooting style creates images that reveal the fearsome expressions of love and devotion you share. No security. Natural. Emotional. Treasured images for life.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Here are the most frequently asked questions we have about my photographers packages, take a minute to read all the listings, and feel free to contact us if you have any other questions!

I have gone to great lengths to make sure my booking process is easy and convenient. A retainer of 50% of your chosen package due in order to secure your date. The retainer fee is non-refundable. For the wedding, the remaining balance will need to be finalized 2 weeks prior to your wedding date, for family or engagement the final payment should be made on the day of the photoshoot by cash.
